data.text: God e dagi nia dagabuli o di langi,
“Goodou hudee heia godou gabunga hai gee,
Hagamaamaa ina nia donu o digau ala e hagaloale
Hagadagaloaha ina digaula gi daha mo nia mogobuna o digau huaidu.
Gei Au guu hai bolo goodou la nia god,
Malaa, goodou la gaa mmade gadoo be nia daangada dangada.
Meenei God, hanimoi e dagi henuailala.
